name: Half in the Bag: The Visual Novel (Free Fangame)
name_original: Half in the Bag: The Visual Novel (Free Fangame)
description:
A mysterious VHS tape with a Black Spine has landed on your doorstep, and as you dust off your old VCR to watch it you find that it's not working ! Oh my Gawwwdd! But don't worry, the boys at Lightning Fast VCR are here to help ! (Or are they........)

Full Gameplay (All 4 Endings): ~30 minutes

Content Warnings: Foul Language, Lots of irresponsible drinkin',  Adult jokes. Every other page or so the screen briefly transitions to white which is why it's recommended to either play during the day or to lower the brightness of your screen.
And the last big warning: This is a fangame. If you don't know Redlettermedia/ Half in the Bag it'll be harder to play.

Bug report: - SAVE at least once before getting to any of the endings or it may not record the Ending as Done !
- When loading a save there’s no background...I couldn’t fix that. The background should be back after a couple dialogue lines.
- If you find more bugs message here: https://www.tumblr.com/new/ask/blortch
